adHeader: English, Reading, Writing - IN HOME PRIVATE TUTORING, Cupertino
adDetails: Hello Parents, Club Z! is the nation's largest in home private tutoring service, operating in more than 450 cities. We offer one-one-one tutoring to elementary, middle, and high school students for all subjects and all ages. Subjects include: English Language Arts - reading, writing, spelling, grammar, vocabulary, literature - at all levels including regular, AP, and Honors. Math - Algebra, Calculus, Geometry, Trigonometry, Math Analysis, Pre-calculus, Statistics, etc. History Foreign Languages - Spanish, Chinese, French and many more languages ================================================================= How Club Z! differentiates itself from other tutors: 1. Convenience: Our tutors come to your home. Students can study in a comfortable environment without any distractions. 2. Flexible: Our tutors work around your busy schedule, making it convenient for you. 3. Immediate Results: Our tutors follow the school curriculum and work very closely with school teachers & guidance counselors. 4. Quality: All of our tutors are degreed, highly qualified, and experts in their subject domain. We check their backgrounds thoroughly. 5. Affordable: Prices are very reasonable compared to all above benefits. SPECIAL PROMOTION: ONE SESSION FREE for just trying us out. (Conditions apply.) Get the best of both worlds: Working with a nationwide company with local support and customized solutions for each student in the comfort of your own home. Need a Tutor? Please contact: Phone show contact info http://www.clubztutoring.com/bayarea Cupertino, Saratoga, Sunnyvale, Los Gatos
